sentences.sContent: And there wasn't just one millipede found - there was a plague of them!
sentences.sContent_eng: And there wasn't just one millipede found - there was a plague of them!
sentences.sCn: 然而发现的并不只是一条千足虫，其数量之多，简直泛滥成灾！

sentences.sContent: It is noteworthy that despite their name, no millipede has more than 750 feet.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is noteworthy that despite their name, no millipede has more than 750 feet.
sentences.sCn: 值得注意的是，尽管他们的名字，没有千足虫已超过750英尺。

sentences.sContent: Any of several arthropods such as the centipede or millipede having segmented bodies one pair of antennae and at least nine pairs of legs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Any of several arthropods such as the centipede or millipede having segmented bodies one pair of antennae and at least nine pairs of legs.
sentences.sCn: 多足纲的节肢动物几种节肢动物的任一种，如蜈蚣或千足虫，长有分节的身体、一对触角和至少九对足。

remMethod.val: milli(千) + ped(脚) + e → 千足虫

trans.tranOther: a long thin creature with a very large number of legs
